title: Just right for you! A gorgeous 1 bed / 1 bath townhome awaits!
map_address: 4150 NW 34th St near State Road seven /Oakland
posting_body: ['St. Croix Apartments', 'Featured Floorplan: 1-bed / 1-bath / 700 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $946', 'Deposit: Call', 'show contact info', 'Description: Offering 1- 2- and 3-bedroom apartment homes, step into tropical seclusion and leave the stress of your everyday world behind.', 'St. Croix, surrounded by lush landscaping, quiet breezes and picturesque views, is an escape from the everyday, with features and amenities provided to give you a lifestyle of beauty, freedom and convenience.', 'Jump-start your mornings with an active workout in our on-site fitness center.', 'Take a refreshing dip in the resort-style swimming pool or print that last minute report for your morning meeting in our community business center.', "St. Croix's commitment to service and excellence assures that your needs are met - in style - and that your life is filled with countless opportunities for relaxation and enjoyment.", 'If you choose to venture out, St. Croix offers unmatched ease and convenience with endless options for "seizing the day!"', "You're just moments from dining, shopping, entertainment and beaches.", 'You can spend less time "getting there" and more time enjoying life to the fullest.', 'Relax.', 'Dream.', 'Live.', 'Welcome to your new lifestyle at St. Croix.', 'Lease Terms: 12-Month', 'Pet Policy: No pets allowed;', 'Apartment Amenities:', '● Ceiling Fan(s)', '● Energy Efficient Appliances', '● Generous Cabinet Space', '● Impact Windows', '● Intrusion Alarm', '● Oak Cabinetry', '● Oversized Closets', '● Screened Patio/Balcony', '● Smoke Free Apartment Home', '● Spacious Floor Plans', 'Community Features:', '● Business Center', '● Clubhouse', '● Computer Lab', '● Covered Parking', '● Elevator Building', '● Fitness Center', '● Guest Parking', '● Mature Landscaping', '● On-site Parking', '● Playground', '● 24-hour Emergency Maintenance', '● Affordable Living in Lauderdale Lakes', "● Children's Playground", '● Laundry Facility(s)', '● Maintenance On-Site', '● Mid-rise Community', '● Property Manager On-Site', '● Smoke-free Community', '● Sparkling Pool Oasis', '● Well-appointed Clubhouse', 'Call us:', 'show contact info', '4150 NW 34th St', 'Lauderdale Lakes, FL 33319', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'CD4BC4FB453E4B0']
